title: API Academy: Making Requests with Postman

validation_fields.name: answer1
validation_fields.label: Create a Postman account and login to Postman's web interface. Confirm you've successfully done so by typing `confirm`.

validation_fields.name: answer2
validation_fields.label: From the Home page of the Postman web interface, click *Workspaces* in the top navigation bar. Once the *Workspaces* page loads, click *New* in the top left corner and then select *HTTP Request*. Use this interface to make a request to the Twilio Programmable SMS API to send a message from your Twilio number to your personal phone number that says `Postman rocks!` If you're having trouble check out the associated video content or blog post. When you get a JSON response in Postman, find the message `sid` and paste it here.
